td.p: This is the login page. Enter your username and your password and press the Login button for login.
The skeleton environment and the CVS checkout have two users already defined:

li.p: A user with full administration rights. Use this user to add new users or administer the rights of other users.
An example user with only the ability to change the sample1 project in the case of the CVS checkout, for the skeleton application there is no project defined, so the user can't change anything.

td.p: Of course you should make sure to change the passwords of all users to something different than "pass".
